title: Private civil liberties index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent to which people are free from forced labor, have property rights, and enjoy the freedoms of movement and religion. The variables ranges from 0 to 1 (most liberties).

relatedQuestions.text: The 'Varieties of Democracy' data: how do researchers measure human rights?
